name: Dungeon's Fall
description:
After the gruesome fight against the Demon Lord, Orick found the archives of the demons. An ancient book states the location of the Last Dungeon: The Fall, a myth, a place that holds the secrets of life and magic. Determined to change the fate of those in the final battle, he decides to embark on his most dangerous journey alone.

Go down as fast as possible, defeat falling enemies, get drops to help you in the journey, avoid obstacles. Collect treasures and get the highest score. Fight Challenging bosses in this roguelike/adventure game. You only have 1 life to complete this monumental task. Enemies, platforms, obstacles are placed randomly.



Survive the longest dungeon ever made.

Features:

Challenging Bosses. (Because saying epic does not make a boss "epic")

Part Physics-based gameplay:



All Traps are placed at random positions.

Relics who can make your journey easier



or more difficult.



You have one life to complete the task. (There is an extra life as drop, but only can have 1 at the time)

The Deepest Dungeon you will ever face (1000km fall)
